verses.text: The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w joy|strong="H8055"\w* in thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and in thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* how \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* shall he \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*!

Thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him his \w heart’s|strong="H3820"\w* \w desire|strong="H8378"\w*, and hast not \w withholden|strong="H4513"\w* the \w request|strong="H0782"\w* of his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

For thou \w preventest|strong="H6923"\w* him with the \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* of \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w*: thou \w settest|strong="H7896"\w* a \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of pure \w gold|strong="H6337"\w* on his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

He \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* of thee, \add and\add* thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* him, \add even\add* \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

His \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* in thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: \w honour|strong="H1935"\w* and \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* hast thou \w laid|strong="H7737"\w* upon him.

For thou hast \w made|strong="H7896"\w* him most \w blessed|strong="H1293"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: thou hast \w made|strong="H2302"\w* him exceeding \w glad|strong="H8057"\w* with thy \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 21.6 \ft made him most…: Heb. set him to be blessings\f*\f + \fr 21.6 \ft made him exceeding…: Heb. make him glad with joy\f*

For the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and through the \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w* he shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.

Thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* shall find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* those that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H7896"\w* them as a \w fiery|strong="H0784"\w* \w oven|strong="H8574"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of thine \w anger|strong="H6440"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall swallow them \w up|strong="H1104"\w* in his \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*, and the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them.

Their \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* shalt thou \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* from among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

For they \w intended|strong="H5186"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against thee: they \w imagined|strong="H2803"\w* a mischievous \w device|strong="H4209"\w*, \add which\add* they are not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \add to perform\add*.

Therefore shalt thou \w make|strong="H7896"\w* them turn their \w back|strong="H7926"\w*, \add when\add* thou shalt make \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \add thine arrows\add* upon thy \w strings|strong="H4340"\w* against the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of them.\f + \fr 21.12 \ft shalt thou…: or, thou shalt set them as a butt\f*\f + \fr 21.12 \ft back: Heb. shoulder\f*

Be thou \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in thine own \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: \add so\add* will we \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* and \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* thy \w power|strong="H1369"\w*.
